net.iceball.mga.game

Class GameSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.iceball.mga.game.GameSettings

  • public class GameSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Floris on 14-09-15.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int countdown
      The amount of seconds the status will count, once zero.
      int JoinLeaveInterval
      Interval you can leave and join back in the status before getting removed from the status. 0 for no interval. 300 is max.
      boolean MultiMode
      SingleMode, one status in one arena, MultiMode, multiple games in multiple arenas.
      java.lang.String Name
      Name of status.
      Scoreboard scoreboard
      Scoreboard is rendered automatically.
      int startCountdownAtPlayerAmount
      The amount of players which are required to start the countdown to start the status.

    • Field Detail

      • Name

        public final java.lang.String Name
        Name of status.

      • JoinLeaveInterval

        public int JoinLeaveInterval
        Interval you can leave and join back in the status before getting removed from the status. 0 for no interval. 300 is max.

      • MultiMode

        public boolean MultiMode
        SingleMode, one status in one arena, MultiMode, multiple games in multiple arenas. False for SingleMode.

      • scoreboard

        public Scoreboard scoreboard
        Scoreboard is rendered automatically.

      • startCountdownAtPlayerAmount

        public final int startCountdownAtPlayerAmount
        The amount of players which are required to start the countdown to start the status.

      • countdown

        public final int countdown
        The amount of seconds the status will count, once zero. Will start the status.
